alert.note: Alert for Baker; Dougherty; Lee; Mitchell; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 12:59PM EDT until April 13 at 1:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM EDT FOR DOUGHERTY...NORTHEASTERN MITCHELL...SOUTHERN LEE...NORTHEASTERN BAKER AND SOUTHWESTERN WORTH COUNTIES... At 1259 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Albany to 7 miles southeast of Baconton, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Albany, Putney, Baconton, East Albany, Marine Corps Logistics Base, Turner City, Walker, Sale City, Bridgeboro, Flint, Radium Springs, Lockett Crossing, South Albany, Southwest Ga Regional A/P, Parkerville, Lester, Pritchetts, Crestwood, Williamsburg and Greenough. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for south central and southwestern Georgia. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for south central and southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
